ISSUE.TITLE: [FEATURE] changing Postgres Port
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I would like to use a different Postgres Port in order to use Port Mapping in my Docker compose for local development and deployment.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [SECURITY][HOTFIX] Fixes GHSA-4hh3-vj32-gr6j (#2421) * Fixes GHSA-4hh3-vj32-gr6j * update SECURITY.md * update dependencies

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Allow custom Postgres port via environment variable (#2368)
Add POSTGRES_PORT environment variable to docker-compose.yml (#2368)
